SceneDescription.name: Dining Room - 1F
SceneDescription.description:
A long table stretches through the middle of the room, a set of fancy chandeliers dangling over it to provide light. The tablecloth has been spread out and stacks of dishes placed on it for when the guests arrive.
A single maid stands at the far end, a glass of wine in hand.
Assassin: [Please don’t tell me she’s planning to do what I think she’s planning to do...]
